security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a collection of payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for Brenda L. Welburn, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing her employment terms, salary, and confirmation of no familial relations with members of Congress.
summary_one_paragraph: This document comprises payroll authorization forms and memoranda relating to Brenda L. Welburn's employment as a Researcher with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) during 1977 and 1978. The forms outline her appointment, salary adjustments, and eventual termination, specifying her gross annual salary and confirming she is not related to any current Member of Congress. Additional memoranda include notification of her starting date and a general staff memo regarding payroll certification procedures.
title: Final Determination Notification
recipient: Thomas Howarth, Elizabeth Berning, All Staff
sender: I. Charles Mathews, Louis Stokes, Brenda L. Welburn signature on the Payroll Certification Form
